options.label: Mono-stable switch type (push button)
Bi-stable switch type
NO (normaly open) input type
NC (normaly close) input type

10.label: Activate / deactivate functions ALL ON/ALL OFF
10.description: Flush 1 relay module responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF that may be sent by the main controller or by other controller belonging to the system

options.label: ALL ON active, ALL OFF active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF active
ALL ON active ALL OFF is not active

11.label: Automatic turning off relay after set time
11.description:
0 => Auto OFF disabled. 
			1 - 32535  => 1 second (0,01s) - 32535 seconds (325,35s). 
			Auto OFF enabled with define time, step is 1s or 10ms according to parameter 15. Default value 0

12.label: Automatic turning on relay after set time
12.description:
0 - Auto OFF disabled. 
			1 - 32535  => 1 second (0,01s) - 32535 seconds (325,35s).
			Auto ON enabled with define time, step is 1s or 10ms according to parameter 15. Default value 0

15.label: Automatic turning on/off seconds or milliseconds selection

options.label: seconds
milliseconds

30.label: Saving the state of the relay after a power failure

options.label: Flush 1 relay module saves its state before power failure (it returns to the last position saved before a power failure)
Flush 1 relay module does not save the state after a power failure, it returns to off position.
When system is turned off the output is 0V (NC)
When system is turned off the output is 230V or 24V (NO)

80.label: Reporting to controller
80.description:
Available from SW version S1 Only 
			This parameter defines if reporting regarding power level, multilevel, etc, are reported to controller or not. 
			NOTE: Disabling reporting is recommended in case Z-wave modules communicate in association groups without using main controller.

options.label: Disabled
Enabled

100.label: Enable / Disable Endpoints I2 or select notification type and event

options.label: Endpoint, I2 disabled
Home Security; Motion Detection, unknown location
Carbon Monoxide; Carbon Monoxide detected, unknown location
Carbon Dioxide; Carbon Dioxide detected, unknown location
Water Alarm; Water Leak detected, unknown location
Heat Alarm; Overheat detected, unknown location
Smoke Alarm; Smoke detected, unknown location
Sensor binary

110.label: Temperature sensor offset settings
110.description:
Set value is added or subtracted to actual measured value by sensor. 
			Available configuration parameters : default value 32536. 32536  offset is 0.0C. 
			From 1 to 100 = value from 0.1C to 10.0C is added to actual measured temperature.
			From 1001 to 1100 = value from -0.1 C to -10.0 C is subtracted to actual measured temperature.

120.label: Digital temperature sensor reporting
120.description:
If digital temperature sensor is connected, module reports measured temperature on temperature change defined by this parameter. 
			Available configuration parameters : 0 = reporting disabled. 1 to 127 = 0,1C to 12,7C, step is 0,1C. Default value is 5 = 0,5C

2.label: Basic on/off of the output state

3.label: Basic on/off of the input I2 state

4.label: Binary Sensor Report of the input I2 state

5.label: Notification Report of the input I2 state
